text: Perfume Genius is the stage name for Mike Hadreas. Hadreas released his first album Learning in 2010. Pitchfork gave it a score of 8.2 out of 10. In 2012 he released his second album, Put Your Back N 2 It. ==Personal life== Hadreas is gay. He lives in Seattle. ==References== Category:American LGBT people Category:American musicians Category:Living people Category:People with Crohn's disease
title: Perfume Genius
